class GrVirtualShadowPage

ctor & dtor

make sure the shadow page and the shadow map sizes are a power of two. This is required because of hardware and floating point limitations.

allocate indirection buffers.

allocate indirection render targets.

create the shadow indirection shader.

fill out the shadow data structure.

fill out the no shadow data structure. create the default indirection texture cube.

build the texgen bias matrix.
